annotations.description: This pre-prohibition classic drink from way back in the 1800's has escaped my grasp until now. I hope it's good... ********************************** This we...
annotations.title: I've never had this drink before | How to Drink

textContent:
1.5 oz. Applejack
1.5 oz. Sweet Vermouth
3 dashes of Angostura Bitters
2 Dashes of Gomme Syrup (optional)

Stir with ice and serve up
Garnish with a lemon twist if desired
Add a dash of curacao if you want to make it more approachable but less interesting. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4lUr_N6151c
title: Star Cocktail
